mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(sort) FROM special a WHERE a.sort = #{sort}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO special( id, special_title, special_article, show_image, sort, create_date, begin_date, end_date, type, is_coupon, pay_company, percent ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{specialTitle}, #{specialArticle}, #{showImage}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{type}, #{isCoupon}, #{payCompany}, #{percent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE special SET special_title = #{specialTitle}, special_article = #{specialArticle}, show_image = #{showImage}, sort = #{sort}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_flag = #{updateFlag}, is_coupon = #{isCoupon}, pay_company = #{payCompany}, percent = #{percent} WHERE id = #{id}
